title: Mobile Suit Gundam Battlefield Record: Avant-Title
synopsis: A short animation serving as a prequel to the events depicted in the PlayStation 3 game, Mobile Suit Gundam: Battlefield Record U.C. 0081.
staff: [['Matsuo, Kou', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Screenplay']], ['Yatate, Hajime', ['Original Creator']], ['Ookawara, Kunio', ['Mechanical Design']], ['Suzuki, Tatsuya', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']]]
